docs.abstract: Smartphone apps from Inrix, Waze and TomTom are making inroads into technology that gathers live information on the speed and location of vehicles on the road and transmits traffic conditions to drivers so they can avoid problems.
docs.snippet: Everybody complains about the traffic, but no one does anything about it. That may finally be changing as new technology to track cars becomes more widely used....
docs.lead_paragraph: Everybody complains about the traffic, but no one does anything about it. That may finally be changing as new technology to track cars becomes more widely used.

docs.abstract: Automakers are racing one another to connect smartphones to in-dash apps and put Internet-based information into so-called connected cars, worrying regulators about even more distracted driving.

docs.abstract: Automakers have for years been taking steps toward production of fully autonomous cars with features like parking assist, lane-departure warning, adaptive cruise control and crash-avoidance technologies; 2014 Mercedes S-Class makes another significant step toward autonomy, using many types of sensors to gather data about driving conditions.
docs.snippet: Autonomous cars have been arriving in bits and pieces for years. Bristling with sensors and microprocessors, cars have been lightening the driver’s workload and improving safety, and more bits of self-driving technology are arriving with 2014 mo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Autonomous cars have been arriving in bits and pieces for years. Bristling with sensors and microprocessors, cars have been lightening the driver’s workload and improving safety, and more bits of self-driving technology are arriving with 2014 models.

docs.abstract: Real Directions feature available on six of Garmin's GPS devices gives spoken driving directions based on landmarks rather than street names.

docs.abstract: Chevrolet is marketing 450-horsepower LT1 engine under hood of its 2014 Corvette as latest incarnation of 58-year-old small-block Chevy V-8; in reality, engine is entirely new, though it shares handful of features with classic engine.
